comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Lockheed C-40B 38-582 c/n 1266. Model 12, used for tricycle tests, then converted back to C-40A. Later NC14999, N14999. Reportedly crashed at Ardmore, OK (date unknown), used for spares. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60/8668495224/] Above is the instrument panel of this aircraft, erroneously listed as "39-583" on the USAF web site.
